00053 static void rna_Scene_frame_set(Scene *scene, int frame, float subframe)
00054 {
00055     scene->r.cfra = frame;
00056     scene->r.subframe = subframe;
00057     
00058     CLAMP(scene->r.cfra, MINAFRAME, MAXFRAME);
00059     scene_update_for_newframe(G.main, scene, (1<<20) - 1);
00060     scene_camera_switch_update(scene);
00061 
00062     /* cant use NC_SCENE|ND_FRAME because this casues wm_event_do_notifiers to call
00063      * scene_update_for_newframe which will loose any un-keyed changes [#24690] */
00064     /* WM_main_add_notifier(NC_SCENE|ND_FRAME, scene); */
00065     
00066     /* instead just redraw the views */
00067     WM_main_add_notifier(NC_WINDOW, NULL);
00068 }
00069 
00070 static void rna_Scene_update_tagged(Scene *scene)
00071 {
00072     scene_update_tagged(G.main, scene);
00073 }
00074 
00075 static void rna_SceneRender_get_frame_path(RenderData *rd, int frame, char *name)
00076 {
00077     if (BKE_imtype_is_movie(rd->im_format.imtype))
00078         BKE_makeanimstring(name, rd);
00079     else
00080         BKE_makepicstring(name, rd->pic, G.main->name, (frame == INT_MIN) ? rd->cfra : frame, rd->im_format.imtype,
00081                           rd->scemode & R_EXTENSION, TRUE);
00082 }
00083 
00084 #ifdef WITH_COLLADA
00085 /* don't remove this, as COLLADA exporting cannot be done through operators in render() callback. */
00086 #include "../../collada/collada.h"
00087 
00088 static void rna_Scene_collada_export(Scene *scene, const char *filepath, int selected, int second_life)
00089 {
00090     collada_export(scene, filepath, selected, second_life);
00091 }

00096 
00097 void RNA_api_scene(StructRNA *srna)
00098 {
00099     FunctionRNA *func;
00100     PropertyRNA *parm;
00101 
00102     func = RNA_def_function(srna, "frame_set", "rna_Scene_frame_set");
00103     RNA_def_function_ui_description(func, "Set scene frame updating all objects immediately");
00104     parm = RNA_def_int(func, "frame", 0, MINAFRAME, MAXFRAME, "", "Frame number to set", MINAFRAME, MAXFRAME);
00105     RNA_def_property_flag(parm, PROP_REQUIRED);
00106     RNA_def_float(func, "subframe", 0.0, 0.0, 1.0, "", "Sub-frame time, between 0.0 and 1.0", 0.0, 1.0);
00107 
00108     func = RNA_def_function(srna, "update", "rna_Scene_update_tagged");
00109     RNA_def_function_ui_description(func,
00110                                     "Update data tagged to be updated from previous access to data or operators");
00111 
00112 #ifdef WITH_COLLADA
00113     /* don't remove this, as COLLADA exporting cannot be done through operators in render() callback. */
00114     func = RNA_def_function(srna, "collada_export", "rna_Scene_collada_export");
00115     parm = RNA_def_string(func, "filepath", "", FILE_MAX, "File Path", "File path to write Collada file");
00116     RNA_def_property_flag(parm, PROP_REQUIRED);
00117     RNA_def_property_subtype(parm, PROP_FILEPATH); /* allow non utf8 */
00118     parm = RNA_def_boolean(func, "selected", 0, "Export only selected", "Export only selected elements");
00119     parm = RNA_def_boolean(func, "second_life", 0, "Export for Second Life", "Compatibility mode for Second Life");
00120     RNA_def_function_ui_description(func, "Export to collada file");
00121 #endif
00122 }
00123 
00124 
00125 void RNA_api_scene_render(StructRNA *srna)
00126 {
00127     FunctionRNA *func;
00128     PropertyRNA *parm;
00129 
00130     func = RNA_def_function(srna, "frame_path", "rna_SceneRender_get_frame_path");
00131     RNA_def_function_ui_description(func, "Return the absolute path to the filename to be written for a given frame");
00132     RNA_def_int(func, "frame", INT_MIN, INT_MIN, INT_MAX, "",
00133                 "Frame number to use, if unset the current frame will be used", MINAFRAME, MAXFRAME);
00134     parm = RNA_def_string_file_path(func, "filepath", "", FILE_MAX, "File Path",
00135                                    "The resulting filepath from the scenes render settings");
00136     RNA_def_property_flag(parm, PROP_THICK_WRAP); /* needed for string return value */
00137     RNA_def_function_output(func, parm);
00138 }

00140 #endif
